text:
Hi <@U03UQT4SGVC> - to get it right. You've migrated from "Theme A" to "Theme B" and after the migration the "click" doesn't work?

If so - it might be because the JS/jQuery part for the "clickevent" is missing

Hi Anton, thanks for answering. The flag icon isn't clickable only on blog, because on the original site yes, <http://kiroconcept.com|kiroconcept.com>. My goal is only to understand how i can delete this icon image, we put the world icon with the choice of the 2 languages
